DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test performance investigational multifocal test soft contact lens .
DOC.criteria: 1 . The subject require read , understand , sign Statement Informed Consent receive fully execute copy form . 2 . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . 3 . Between 40 70 year age . 4 . Subjects must wearable pair spectacle , require distance vision . 5 . Be adapt soft contact lens wearer eye ( i.e . worn lens minimum 2 day per week least 8 hour per wear day , 1 month duration ) 6 . Already wear presbyopic contact lens correction ( e.g. , read spectacle contact lens , multifocal monovision contact lenses , etc . ) respond positively least one symptom `` Presbyopic Symptoms Questionnaire '' * 7 . The subject 's vertex correct spherical equivalent distance refraction require range +3.50 5.75 eye . 8 . Refractive cylinder â‰¤ 0.75 D eye . 9 . ADD power range +0.75 D +2.50 D eye . 10 . Best correct visual acuity 20/203 good eye . 1 . Currently pregnant lactating ( subject become pregnant study discontinue ) . 2 . Any ocular systemic allergy may contraindicate contact lens wear . 3 . Any ocular systemic disease , autoimmune disease , use medication , may contraindicate contact lens wear . 4 . Any ocular abnormality may interfere contact lens wear . 5 . Use ocular medication , exception rewetting drop . 6 . Any previous intraocular surgery ( e.g. , radial keratotomy , PRK , LASIK , etc. ) . 7 . History herpetic keratitis . 8 . History binocular vision abnormality strabismus . 9 . Any infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) contagious immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV ) . 10 . History diabetes . 11 . Participation contact lens lens care product clinical trial within 30 day prior study enrollment . 12 . Any Grade 3 great slit lamp finding ( e.g. , edema , corneal neovascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection ) may contraindicate contact lens wear . 13 . Any ocular infection inflammation . 14 . Any corneal distortion irregular cornea .
